info.guardianproject.otr.app.im.engine

Interface GroupListener


  • public interface GroupListener
    Interface for group change events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_CREATING_GROUP 
      static int ERROR_DELETING_GROUP 
      static int ERROR_JOINING_IN_GROUP 
      static int ERROR_LEAVING_GROUP 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Called when a chat group was successfully created.
      void onGroupDeleted(ChatGroup group)
      Called when a chat group was successfully deleted.
      void onGroupError(int errorType, java.lang.String groupName, ImErrorInfo error)
      Called when an error occurs with a certain group operation.
      void onJoinedGroup(ChatGroup group)
      Called on joining in a chat group successfully.
      void onLeftGroup(ChatGroup group)
      Called on leaving a chat group.

    • Method Detail

      • onGroupCreated

        void onGroupCreated(ChatGroup group)
        Called when a chat group was successfully created.
        Parameters:
        group - the group was created.

      • onGroupDeleted

        void onGroupDeleted(ChatGroup group)
        Called when a chat group was successfully deleted.
        Parameters:
        group - the group was deleted.

      • onJoinedGroup

        void onJoinedGroup(ChatGroup group)
        Called on joining in a chat group successfully.
        Parameters:
        group - the group which was joined into.

      • onLeftGroup

        void onLeftGroup(ChatGroup group)
        Called on leaving a chat group. It may be triggered by the user leaving a group or a server initiated group leaving, e.g. the user got kicked out of the group, the group is deleted, etc.
        Parameters:
        group - the group has left.

      • onGroupError

        void onGroupError(int errorType,
                  java.lang.String groupName,
                  ImErrorInfo error)
        Called when an error occurs with a certain group operation.
        Parameters:
        errorType - the type of the error
        error - the error information.
